    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_a3f2583b927e90641148d827f8461f1af7895a21</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_a3f2583b927e90641148d827f8461f1af7895a21</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sun and stars movement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne und Sternbewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exposez au soleil et tenez le premier rôle le 
mouvement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sol e movimento das estrelas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sole e movimento delle stelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ήλιος και μετακίνηση αστεριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sol y movimiento de las estrellas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an old model of the movement of the Sun and the stars. People used to think that the earth is still and that the Sun and stars move around it.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">star</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein altes Modell der 
Bewegung der Sonne und der Sterne. Leute pflegten, zu denken, 
daß die Masse noch ist und daß die Sonne und die Sterne um sie 
bewegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que un vieux modèle du
mouvement du soleil et tient le premier rôle. Les gens avaient 
l'habitude de penser que la terre est toujours et que le soleil et 
tiennent le premier rôle le mouvement autour de lui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um modelo velho do 
movimento do sol e das estrelas. Os povos usaram-se pensar de 
que a terra é ainda e de que o sol e as estrelas se movem em torno 
dela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un vecchio modello 
del movimento del sole e delle stelle. La gente ha usato pensare
che la terra fosse ancora e che il sole e le stelle si muovono intorno
esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει παλαιό μοντέλο της 
μετακίνησης του ήλιου και των αστεριών. Οι άνθρωποι 
χρησιμοποίησαν για να σκεφτούν ότι η γη είναι ακόμα και ότι ο 
ήλιος και τα αστέρια κινούνται γύρω από την.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un viejo modelo del 
movimiento del sol y de las estrellas. La gente pensaba que la 
tierra todavía está y que el sol y las estrellas se mueven alrededor
de ella.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tenez le premier rôle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le soleil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estrela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sol</string>
